title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Running Back
content: Teamwork is key in this rugged Adversary Mode where a single runner behind the wheel of the pint-sized Panto compact has to make a mad dash to the end zone before time is up with help from their teammates on offense. Meanwhile, defenders need to grind the Panto to a halt and prevent them from scoring. Hit the ground running and earn Double Rewards for your efforts.
